transcription.speaker: Customer
transcription.text: Hi, I need help with my bill. I think I've been overcharged.

transcription.speaker: Customer
transcription.text: I was charged for a service I didn't use.

transcription.speaker: Employee
transcription.text: I don't know what you expect me to do about that. Just deal with it.

transcription.speaker: Customer
transcription.text: Can you at least look into it?

transcription.speaker: Employee
transcription.text: I don't have time for this. Call back later.
